summary: Maria, a Ukrainian doctor, comes to Portugal to spend a year in with her husband, also a doctor. She is approached by agents of the Immigration Services that take her to an interrogation ... See full summary »
cast: Maria de Medeiros|Isabel Ruth|Makena Diop|Rebeca Close|Pedro Pacheco|José Wallenstein|Mykola Chaban|Miguel Mendes|António Pires|Jorge Barros|Miguel Figueira|Nuno César|Nuno Milagre|Gracinha|João Pedro Bénard
title: Viagem a Portugal
